provides all the needed APIs to control your Ingenico device (iSMP, iSMP Companion and iCMP)

 Method called if network errors occur during communication with a remote host. More...
 

Detailed Description

Notifications of network connection changes.

These callbacks are defined within ICNetworkDelegate and should be implemented by the delegate of ICNetwork

Function Documentation

- (void) networkData: (NSData *)  data
incoming: (BOOL)  isIncoming 

Log event handler to be implemented by the delegate of the ICNetwork object.

Parameters
dataThe logged network data
isIncomingYES if the data comes to the iDevice, NO otherwise.
- (void) networkDidConnectToHost: (NSString *)  host
onPort: (NSUInteger)  port 

Method called when a connection to a remote host is opened.

ICNetwork delegate may implement this method to be notified when a network connection is established between the Companion and a remote server

Parameters
hostThe host name or IP address
portThe destination port
- (void) networkDidDisconnectFromHost: (NSString *)  host
onPort: (NSUInteger)  port 

Method called when the Companion is disconnected from a remote host.

ICNetwork delegate may implement this method to be notified when the Companion is disconnected from a remote server.

Parameters
hostThe host name or IP address
portThe destination port
- (void) networkDidReceiveErrorWithHost: (NSString *)  host
andPort: (NSUInteger)  port 

Method called if network errors occur during communication with a remote host.

ICNetwork delegate may implement this method to be notified if there are some network errors when communicating with the remote host.

Parameters
hostThe host name or IP address
portThe destination port
- (void) networkFailedToConnectToHost: (NSString *)  host
onPort: (NSUInteger)  port 

Method called when the network channel failed to connect to a remote host.

ICNetwork delegate may implement this method to be notified of connection failures to a remote server.

Parameters
hostThe host name or IP address
portThe destination port
- (void) networkWillConnectToHost: (NSString *)  host
onPort: (NSUInteger)  port 

Method called when the network channel tries to connect to a remote host.

ICNetwork delegate may implement this method to be notified when the Companion attempts to open a connection to a remote server.

Parameters
hostThe host name or IP address
portThe destination port
